thread.title: The most pointless argument people have been involved in (5 Photos)
thread.title_full: The most pointless argument people have been involved in (5 Photos)

author: Travis
title: The most pointless argument people have been involved in (5 Photos)
text:
Mackin-N-Cheese ____ 
A bunch of us were watching the movie Highlander in college. There’s a line where a lady compares an ancient sword to finding a 747 jet that was built 1000 years before the Wright brothers invented the airplane. One guy insisted that it was possible. He asked, “How do you know that there isn’t a 747 jet buried somewhere.” No matter what argument we presented, he just replied, “How do you know?” wasitabarorabatisaw ____ 
Not me, but when my daughter and her friend were in 3rd grade my daughter came running into the house crying and bleeding on her neck and chest. Apparently she and her friend had just come to blows (scratches) over how big the friend’s imaginary friend was. Not even kidding. pcspain ____ 
If you put the toilet seat down while you shit. Apparently, 2 of my friends thought that only girls put down the seat while they took a shit. Their whole life they though men put up the seat while they shit. PM_TITS_FOR_GOLD 5 
My junior year of high school I got into a very heated debate with my friend over whether Cheetos were considered chips. After half an hour of yelling about this, he finally called Frito-Lay headquarters to ask their opinion on the matter. They’re not chips xSMUFFINx ____ 
I once spent almost an entire class trying to explain the “Bob’s mom has three kids. April, May, and who?” riddle to a girl that sat next to me. She must have answered with every month at least once, even after I drew the family tree and pointed to Bob and his mother as I repeated it very slowly. She simply could not even. Advocate_Diplomacy ____ 
What hummus is made out of? I said Garbanzo beans, my boyfriend said chickpeas. Neither of us knew what the other was.
